name: roar-of-time
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user blasts the
foe with power that
distorts even time.
The user must rest
on the next turn.
